text: læa meux phwk khea di phb bæ br rda phu thi sraththa phwk khea k klaw wa rea sraththa kan læw læa meux bang khnnı phwk khea xyu tamlaphang kab xik bang khn phwk khea k klaw wa phwk than ca phud hı phwk khea fang sung sing thi xallxh di thrng peidphey kæ phwk than pheux phwk khea ca di na sing nan pi pen hlakthan yunyan kæ phwk than n thi phracea khxng phwk than kranan hrux? Phwk than mi chı payya dxk hrux
